79.title: Art Class
79.plot: Grandpa Bee is reluctant to come along to the Art Class that Aunty Bee has organised. Buzzbee is disappointed - he wants all his family to be there. He convinces Grandpa to give it a try and Grandpa discovers his creative side.

80.title: Postman Spider's Bounce
80.plot: Postman Spider has lost his usual enthusiasm for his work and wants to retire. Buzzbee tries lots of different approaches to help but Postman Spider gets his bounce back after Buzzbee discovers that very small changes can make a big difference.

81.title: The Chatterbug
81.plot: Debee has a new Chatterbug toy that mimics everything you say. Buzzbee and friends are desperate to have a go and so Debee lends it to them. When it stops working they go to great lengths to fix it -- only to find the problem is a simple one.

82.title: Team Bees
82.plot: Buzzbee's class splits into two teams led by Mrs Wasp and Postman Spider for an after-school club but find out it's more fun to be one big group.

83.title: Rumble Tum Time
83.plot: Buzzbee and Barnabee discover ways to tell the time through the natural world, including their tummies.

84.title: Who's Minding Who
84.plot: Buzzbee has to rescue Grandma Bee when she takes an unexpected ride on Jasper's buzzboard.

85.title: The Arrival of Midge
85.plot: Buzzbee and Barnabee feel left out when Jasper gets a pet midge for his birthday but Jasper soon needs their help looking after her.

86.title: Mamma Bee's Health Kick
86.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

87.title: See for Yourself
87.plot: Pappa Bee's reluctance to wear his new glasses causes problems until Buzzbee and Barnabee step in to help.

88.title: A Neat Trick
88.plot: Princess Beetrice comes up with a plan to show Buzzbee and friends that she's more than just royalty.

93.title: The Pumpkin Patch Puzzle
93.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Postman Buzzbee
1.plot: When Postman Spider injures his ankle, Buzzbee finishes his route for him.

2.title: A Royal Visit
2.plot: It's the school's birthday and Queen Bee is coming to visit. Buzzbee's sister, Rubee, is chosen to give Queen Bee flowers, the other little bugs all have jobs to do to get ready, but Buzzbee is struggling to find a way to help out.

3.title: Babee's Room
3.plot: Buzzbee and Rubee wake up to find Grandma Bee making pancakes for breakfast because Mamma and Pappa are going to bring home a baby bee. Buzzbee and Rubee compete to see who can welcome Babee home the best.

4.title: Buzzbee the Magician
4.plot: Pappa Bee gives Buzzbee his old magic hat and wand. Buzzbee practices his magic tricks and puts on a show for his friends.

5.title: Scaredy Bee
5.plot: Pappa Bee, Buzzbee, and his friend Barnabee have a camp out in the back yard, but the little bees can't sleep because of a scary noise.

6.title: Buzzbee to the Rescue
6.plot: Buzzbee is learning to tie a bandage from Doctor Beetle, but when Vincent hurts his foot, Buzzbee and Jasper fight over which way they should wrap the bandage.

7.title: Computer Bee
7.plot: When Buzzbee tries help Mamma Bee by sending her email shopping list to the store, he accidentally sends an order for four million eggs. Vincant teaches Buzzbee how to email, and Buzzbee teaches Grandpa Bee.

8.title: Sporty Bee
8.plot: Buzzbee's friend Barnabee is anxious about the upcoming Sports Day at school, so the they decide to practice. On Sports Day, Buzzbee is sick and convinces Barnabee to take his place in the egg and spoon race.

9.title: Birthday Bee
9.plot: It is Pappa Bee's birthday and Buzzbee and Mamma Bee bake a cake for him, but when Rubee shows them her cake, they are the ones who are surprised.

-1.title: The Wonky Sign
-1.plot: Follow the adventures of the inquisitive young bee, Buzzbee, his family at The Hive and his friends down on Honey Farm! When a windy day causes chaos, Buzzbee and friends have to decide who needs their help first.

imdb.title: The Hive
plot: This preschool CGI animated series follows the fortunes of the extremely cute Bee family, who live together with their friends and relations in the Hive.::A Hive Enterprises co-production with DQ Entertainment in association with Lupus Films, Monumental Productions, Bejuba! Entertainment and Picture Production Company
